page.title: 05THE KINDLY MONSTER
page.content: {THE KINDLY MONSTER Although it is not with in our designated area I would like to mention that not far away sits a harmless monster,a volcanic plug called {Traprain Law }. It is a good hill to climb and from our village it looks like a sleeping whale. There is a legend that an ancient king called {Loth }lived there and from him our area took its name of {Lothian }. There was also a Celtic tribe lived there.They were the { {Votadini. }They lived in mud huts and made peace with the Romans when they invaded Caledonia. In 1919 a silver treasure from Roman times was found there and can now be seen in the National Museum of Antiquities in {Edinburgh }and is well worth a visit.
